name: DELLOS AND THE DUNGEON OF DARKNESS
name_original: DELLOS AND THE DUNGEON OF DARKNESS
description:
It's a dungeon adventure game. The story is that "dellos" he is hired to defeat the goblins in a crystal-filled dungeon.

PLAY GAME

MAIN CHARACTER 

"Dellos"  he was a young boy born with mysterious fiery red eyes. He was hired to defeat the goblins in a crystal-filled dungeon. He had to use a magic wand to get rid of them.

WEAPON

" DARK HOUND WAND "

A magic wand that collects the user's magical energy, releases it into a ball filled with magical energy. and also glows in the dark to use in guiding the user as well

THE SIDE-STORY OF EQALITY  DEKANT TEAM MEMBER
